title: Software Developer 1
description:
**Job Description**
 We are looking for an Infrastructure Provisioning Engineer to join our team. This position is ideal for candidates with foundational knowledge of operating systems, virtualization, and infrastructure basics who are eager to grow in a modern DevOps ecosystem.
   

  

 Your primary responsibilities will include support day\\-to\\-day provisioning activities, enhance automation workflows, and develop scripts to streamline routine tasks. You will gain hands\\-on experience with tools such as Chef and Terraform while learning and applying automation best practices to optimize provisioning processes.
   

  

 This role is ideal for someone who is early in their career looking to strengthen their skills in infrastructure automation, virtualization, and cloud provisioning.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**RESPONSIBILITIES**
* Assist in provisioning, maintaining, and supporting infrastructure components across VMware\\-based environments.
* Work closely with senior engineers to automate provisioning workflows and improve overall efficiency.
* Develop and maintain scripts using Python, Shell, or PowerShell to automate repetitive tasks.
* Support configuration management and infrastructure automation using Chef and Terraform (basic working knowledge required).
* Participate in troubleshooting and root\\-cause analysis for provisioning or infrastructure issues.
* Contribute to CI/CD improvements and operational best practices.
* Maintain accurate documentation, runbooks, and operational guidelines.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to ensure smooth and reliable deployment pipelines.
* Demonstrate a strong willingness to learn new tools, technologies, and methodologies aligned with DevOps and infrastructure engineering.


**Required Qualifications**
* VMware ecosystem knowledge (vCenter, ESXi basics, VM provisioning, templates, snapshots, datastores).
* Hands\\-on scripting with at least one of:
+ Shell
+ Python
+ PowerShell

* Understanding of infrastructure fundamentals: networking basics, OS concepts (Linux/Windows), storage.
* Basic exposure to:
+ Chef (cookbooks, attributes, basic resource usage)
+ Terraform (HCL syntax, modules, providers)

* Familiarity with code versioning using Git.
* Ability to debug issues logically and follow structured troubleshooting.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Any engineering or automation project done during college or internships (e.g., cloud setup, scripting projects, automation tools, small\\-scale DevOps pipelines).
* Basic understanding of CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or GitLab.
* Exposure to cloud platforms (OCI/AWS/Azure) is a plus.
* Interest in infrastructure automation, reliability engineering, and cloud provisioning technologies.


**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC1
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s challenges. We’ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That’s why we’re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation\\-request\\_mb@oracle.com or by calling \\+1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.

title: Software Developer 3
description:
**Job Description**
 The OCI Developer platform tools and services Group is constructing a robust suite of products aimed at supporting and enhancing the developer experience and monitoring and operational capabilities of OCI services. This group provides a comprehensive set of tools and technologies to ensure efficient and effective management of OCI's operations.
   

  

 By developing and optimizing these products with better user experience , the group aims to empower OCI services with the necessary resources to excel in their operational roles, ultimately contributing to the overall success and reliability of OCI's offerings. This initiative is a strategic step towards strengthening OCI's position in the market by prioritizing service performance and customer satisfaction.
   

  

 Required Skills: Java (Programming Language),System Design ,Debugging ,Javascript , Typescript,React or related UI framework and Software Development
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a Senior Engineer, you will contribute to the simple to medium design, development, and operations of key components within Oracle’s Cloud Infrastructure in a very collaborative environment. You should be capable of specifying, designing, and implementing enhancements to existing software architectures in response to evolving requirements with scalability, reliability and seamless operations in mind. A strong ability to dive deep into all layers of the technology stack, including low\\-level systems as well as ability to quickly find solutions to problems using the latest tools, is essential. In addition, you will provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior software engineers on the team
   

  

 Basic Qualification
   

  

 As a Senior Software Developer you will participate in design ,development of Oracles DevOps CI/CD Services in Cloud platform. You should be a rock solid coder and have passion to learn and flexible new technologies. You should value simplicity and scale, work comfortably in a collaborative, agile environment, and be excited to learn.
   

  

* \\-3 to 5 years of experience with application development and extend to work as BE and UX engineer
* \\- Strong distributed systems fundamentals
* \\- Bachelors in computer science and Engineering or related engineering fields Preferred :
* Strong distributed systems fundamentals
* Backend designing and development
* UI development


**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC3

title: Software Developer 3
description:
**Job Description**
 Who we are ?
   

  

 CX Industry Solutions group envisions providing a unified CX suite for industries built around common platform and framework. We, Siebel team are developing industry leading software for decades and enabling customers realize their potential through innovation and digital transformation. If you love technology and want to solve problems by using latest technologies in the cloud\\-native and automation domains. We have an exciting opportunity for you as a top DevOps professional in our cloud journey.
   

  

 In this role you will be accountable for engineering solutions and deployment strategies for Siebel on cloud. You will be integral part of Siebel development team. You are expected to code using Python and on a day\\-to\\-day basis, you will be working with cloud\\-native technologies such as Kubernetes, Containerization, Helm, Observability, Telemetry, GitOps, PaaS, Terraform, and Cloud infrastructure to build highly scalable and well\\-rounded cloud native product life cycle management solution.
   

  

 You are expected to use standard reference architectures to arrive at pipelines for cloud infrastructure, continuous integrations and continuous delivery/deployment. You will be engaged with a highly collaborative development team to build effective DevOps solutions in cloud.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Qualification
   

  

* Possess B.E/ B.Tech/ M.E/ M.Tech degree in computer science or relevant experience.
* Possess 4\\-10 years of Software Industry experience required.
* Possess 2\\-5 years of DevOps/Cloud experience required.
* Self\\-motivated with the ability to work well both in groups and independently.
* Attention to details \\& strong analytical and engineering skills.
* Proven ability to collaborate successfully across cross\\-functional teams.
* Possess excellent written and oral communication skills.


 Special Skills
   

  

* Experience on any public cloud like OCI, GCP, AWS or Azure
* Familiarity/experience with AI
* Hands\\-on experience in setting up pipelines using terraforms, Ansible or any competent frameworks.
* Hands\\-on with Docker, Kubernetes and Helm.
* Comfortable working in a Kubernetes environment on a day\\-to\\-day basis, for building pipelines and deploying, managing applications.
* Experience on working with service mesh, rolling updates, GitOps using Flux cd or Argo cd is a plus.
* Hands on experience with monitoring, log management tools such as ELK/ EFK stack or Splunk or OpenSearch stack.
* Well versed in python programming.
* Strong understanding of Linux/Unix commands
* SQL and RDBMS knowledge desired
* REST Web Services knowledge is desired.
* Agile/SCRUM process development methodology knowledge/experience is a plus


**Responsibilities**
* Develop prototypes, and demonstrations using cloud native technologies.
* Work closely with development teams to understand requirements of different artifacts of deployments.
* Managing infrastructure stack upgrades, includes nodes, clusters, istio/service mesh, GitOps tools, etc.
* Maintenance of pipelines and related scripts.
* Automation Script development: developing scripts for various applications using Python or Bash in an agile development ecosystem.
* Extend the automation framework as necessary
* Doing research and adopt readily available standard open\\-source tools to accomplish the goal of automation.
* Writing detailed guides for the features.


 Common Traits
   

  

* Operate both independently and as part of a team, often as the primary contact for Engineering teams
* Cooperate with others within and outside group who impact work processes to achieve group objectives


**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC3
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s challenges. We’ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That’s why we’re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.

title: Java Backend (Java + Spark) (DT70SI RM 3810)
description:
**Position: Java Backend (Java \\+ Spark) (DT70SI RM 3810\\)**
**Experience : Min. 7\\+ Yrs Overall
   

  

 Relevant : Min. 6\\+ Yrs**
**Job Description**
 We are looking for a highly skilled
 **Java Backend Developer** 
 with strong expertise in
 **Core Java, J2EE, Spring Boot, Microservices, and Apache Spark** 
 . The ideal candidate should have hands\\-on experience in designing, developing, and maintaining scalable backend systems with modern cloud and data technologies.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and develop backend services using Java, J2EE, Spring Boot, and Microservices architecture.
* Build and optimize RESTful APIs and backend components for high performance and reliability.
* Work extensively with Apache Spark for data processing and integration.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design scalable and resilient solutions.
* Work on RDBMS (Oracle, MySQL) and NoSQL (Cassandra) databases.
* Contribute to CI/CD pipelines, source control management, and deployment automation.
* Follow best practices in code quality, testing (TDD/BDD), and continuous integration.
* Perform code reviews and participate in architectural discussions.


**Required Skills**
* Strong proficiency in Core Java, J2EE, Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, and Apache Spark.
* Solid understanding of microservices architecture.
* Experience with cloud technologies.
* Knowledge of CI/CD tools, code scanning, and test automation frameworks.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and understanding of object\\-oriented design patterns.
* Excellent teamwork, communication, and analytical skills.

title: Software Quality Sr Engineer
description:
Job Details
   

  

**Description**
**Software Quality Senior Engineer**
**General Summary**
 Archer is the industry\\-leading enterprise software for Integrated Risk Management and recognized as leaders in the Gartner quadrant for several years now. Archer helps organizations manage risk in the digital era—uniting stakeholders, integrating technologies, and transforming risk into reward. Over a thousand customers worldwide harness the ArcherIRM platform and its comprehensive suite of solutions to automate the compliance process, meet their risk objectives, and optimize business.
   

  

 This position is for a modern and brand new SaaS product “
 **Archer Engage** 
 ” having 120\\+ customers worldwide. Archer Engage suite of products delivers a modern, consumer app\\-like user experience to the infrequent users and stake holders to ensure active engagement in helping the enterprise manage risk and third\\-party risk management. Engage is based on serverless architecture and built on cutting edge technology stack comprising of AWS Cloud Native Services, ReactJS,.NETCore, NodeJS, Kubernetes and Gitlab CI/CD. For more information, visit https://www.archerirm.com/
   

  

 We are seeking a passionate, self\\-motivated Software Quality Senior Engineer with proven hands\\-on experience in Manual and Automated testing. You will be joining a top notch and highly motivated team of DevOps engineers who thrive on end\\-to\\-end ownership of entire product life cycle starting from design to deployment to operations.
   

  

**Duties And Responsibilities**
* Authors test plans and executes test cases and testing methodology for manual and automated tests.
* Understands and adheres to delivery/quality targets established during regression and testing phase.
* Contribute to test automation framework and activities through knowledge of coding/programming in current languages.
* Develops new test methodologies or processes, re\\-evaluates existing processes. Contributes to the development and achievement of organizational goals and objectives.
* General understanding of business environment. Fosters teamwork and collaboration within and across work groups.
* Implementation, and maintenance of a test environment.
* Demonstrated skill with developing appropriate test methodologies. Fully competent in the use of necessary tools and applications.
* Ability to troubleshoot the issues and provide solutions with the functional \\& domain knowledge
* Ability to collaborate effectively within the team and across other cross\\-functional teams


**Experience And Skills Needed**
***Required Skills***
**:**
* 5\\+ years hands\\-on expertise in QE – Planning and Testing
* 2\\-3 years hands\\-on expertise in test automation (UI and API) with tools like Playwright (preferred) , Test Café, BDD Protractor, Postman, Java.
* Good exposure to testing Web\\-based applications
* Ability to understand the requirements and provide effective test artifacts and Solutions
* Good troubleshooting and problem\\-solving skills
* Good communication skills both oral and written
* Good understanding of development methodologies with Agile Scrum/SAFE Agile


**Desired Skills**
* Knowledge of AWS or Azure or any Cloud platforms
* Any CI/CD tool, pipelines knowledge – Gitlab/Jenkins


**Education**
 BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent technical field

title: DevOps Engineer II
description:
**About GoKwik**
 GoKwik is a growth operating system designed to power D2C and eCommerce brands from checkout optimization and reducing return\\-to\\-origin (RTO), to payments, retention, and post\\-purchase engagement. Today, GoKwik enables over 15,000\\+ merchants worldwide, processes around $2 billion in GMV, and is strengthening its AI\\-powered infrastructure. Backed by RTP Global, Z47, Peak XV, and Think Investments and bolstered by a $13 million growth round in June 2025 (total funding: $68 million), GoKwik is scaling aggressively across India, the UK, Europe, and the US.
   

  

**Why This Role Matters**
 We are looking for an SRE\\-focused Engineer to join our DevOps team. This role is 80% Site Reliability Engineering and 20% DevOps enablement, with observability, resilience, and incident management at its core. You will lead on\\-call operations, build world\\-class observability systems, and drive reliability engineering practices across the organization. Alongside, you’ll also collaborate on automation and CI/CD improvements to ensure services are built and operated for scale. We are an engineering\\-focused team — continuously investing in tools, tests, processes, and technology. We consider our people to be our biggest asset and strive to build a culture of continuous learning and growth.
   

  

**What You’ll Own**
* Lead SRE practices for reliability, scaling, and performance of production systems.
* Lead on\\-call operations and incident response, ensuring fast resolution and minimizing customer impact.
* Perform deep debugging of production issues across infra, services, and databases.
* Design and automate self\\-healing, scalable infrastructure.
* Architect and implement advanced observability (metrics, logs, traces, SLIs/SLOs, APM) to detect, debug, and prevent outages.
* Support CI/CD and infra automation (Terraform, Kubernetes, pipelines) as part of DevOps responsibilities (20%).
* Implement and mature observability practices (SLIs/SLOs, distributed tracing, APM).
* Mentor junior engineers in incident management and DevOps best practices.
* Partner with engineering teams on resilient architecture reviews.
* Commitment to continuous innovation by researching and proposing adoption of new tools and industry best practices to enhance infrastructure reliability.
* Conduct blameless postmortems, improve incident playbooks, and drive prevention culture.


**Who You Are**
* 5–8 years of experience in SRE / Production Engineering (with some DevOps exposure).
* Proven expertise in incident management, debugging distributed systems, and on\\-call operations.
* Strong background in observability platforms (Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog, OpenTelemetry, or similar).
* Deep knowledge of cloud infra (AWS/GCP) including networking, scaling, HA/DR.
* Hands\\-on with Kubernetes, Terraform, and CI/CD pipelines.
* Experience with incident frameworks, blameless postmortems, chaos/ resiliency testing.
* Ability to balance short\\-term firefighting with long\\-term reliability engineering.
* Strong scripting skills (Shell, Python, or Go preferred).


**Why GoKwik?**
 At GoKwik, we aren’t just building tools — we’re rewriting the playbook for eCommerce in India. We exist to solve some of the most complex challenges faced by digital\\-first brands: low conversion rates, high RTO, and poor post\\-purchase experience. Our checkout and conversion stack powers 500\\+ leading D2C brands and marketplaces — and we’re just getting started.

title: C# Developer
description:
**Key Responsibilities**
* Design \\& Develop: Architect and implement scalable, well\\-documented, and efficient code primarily in C\\#
* Feature Ownership: Take ownership of the full lifecycle of major features, from design and development to deployment including unit test cases, Specification dossier wherever it is applicable
* Collaboration:Collaborate with Airbus focal or counterparts to capture the requirements and keep the project management tracker uptodate
* Optimization: Identify and resolve performance and scaling challenges across the application stack.


**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**
* Core Language Proficiency: 5\\+ years of professional experience with C\\# programming language.
* CATIA: Knowledge in CATIA is a plus.
* Data Model Mapping: Strong experience in Data Model mapping \\& Data Migration topics.
* Design \\& Architecture: Knowledge on designing and developing windows batches using C\\#
* Databases: Strong working knowledge on SQL
* Testing: Commitment to rigorous testing (unit, integration, and end\\-to\\-end testing).


**Interpersonal Skills (Soft Skills)**
* Communication: Excellent ability to articulate complex technical issues and designs to both technical teams and business stakeholders.
* Autonomy: Ability to work independently and manage time effectively on multiple simultaneous projects.
* Candidate to be in office for 3 or more days as per the project focal needs (For In\\-situ)


**Experience:** 
 5\\-8 Years
   

  

**Education:** 
 BE/B.Tech
   

  

**Employment Type:** 
 Full Time
   

  

**Location:** 
 Bengaluru
   

  

 Why Join ALTEN India?
   

  

* Opportunity to work with leading global aerospace clients.
* Dynamic, innovation\\-driven environment with exposure to cutting\\-edge technologies.
* Continuous learning and career growth opportunities.
* Inclusive and collaborative workplace culture.

title: Senior Consultant
description:
**Job Description**
 The Banking Consulting division within FSGUI is dedicated to transforming the banking landscape by delivering agile, digital, and efficient solutions tailored to the specific needs of financial institutions. Our focus is on addressing the complex challenges banks face through innovative and comprehensive offerings.
   

  

 We are currently seeking a Senior Consultant to lead the design, development, and integration of Oracle Banking Digital Experience (OBDX) solutions. The ideal candidate will bring strong technical proficiency in Java, web services, and front\\-end technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, with a solid understanding of digital banking platforms.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Contribute to both user interface (UI/UX) development and server\\-side Java APIs functionality of digital banking solutions.
* Build and implement integrations using SOAP and RESTful web services.
* Design, develop, and tailor Oracle Banking Digital Experience (OBDX) applications to meet the needs of banking clients.
* Work closely with functional consultants and business users to convert business requirements into effective technical solutions.
* Write optimized SQL queries and manage complex database schemas.
* Engage in code reviews, unit testing, and system performance optimization.


**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC2
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s challenges. We’ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That’s why we’re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation\\-request\\_mb@oracle.com or by calling \\+1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.

title: Site Reliability Developer 2
description:
**Job Description**
**CNE** 
 provides a microservice\\-driven platform, software delivery tool chain, and a continuous integration/continuous delivery operations model to support high margin, highly elastic, and highly available Software as a Service (SaaS) applications.
 **Network Services** 
 ensure reliability and security around ingress/egress in the
 **CNE** 
 environment. The
 **Network Services** 
 team supports these services 24x7 / 365 in deployed environments. The Network Services team currently uses technologies such as:
 ***GIT, Python, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, LDAP, DNS, Squid Proxy, ELK, Jenkins/gitlab\\-ci, FileBeat, MetricBeat, Vault, Consul***
 (the technologies are subject to change).
   

  

**Network Services** 
 is looking for a engineers that have programming skills. Network Services area of responsibility include configuration of subnets, route pathing, security lists, and DNS resolution through a “infrastructure as code” process. And will solve complex problems related to infrastructure cloud services and build automation to prevent problem recurrence.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The candidate will work with highly skilled, highly motivated engineers using agile methodologies. The team embraces a DevOps environment. The team treats everything as code (code, configuration, infrastructure, pipelines, everything) to achieve the highest quality product in the most efficient amount of time.
   

  

 The candidate will work on software\\-defined network management changes as requested through Service Requests from our customer base and peer development groups. These changes include, but are not limited to, the following tasks:
   

  

* Manage network configuration through Terraform or other configuration\\-as\\-code changes
* Security list modifications, subnet creation, route table updates, network peering connections
* Submitting Merge Requests to modify environments using Terraform code
* Inspecting and approving Merge Requests to modify environments
* Identify and write bug stories as needed
* Improve/Modify automation code as needed to maintain reliability and expand capabilities
* Monitor alerts occurring in the environment and respond accordingly
* Investigate connectivity issues as reported by customer base
* Use Everything\\-As\\-Code methodologies to ensure traceability, configurability, immutability, repeatability, and governability
* Attend training as required to meet Oracle and CNE compliance and regulatory standards. Perform daily task in accordance of compliance and regulatory standards
* Other duties as assigned


**General Qualifications**
* Major in an engineering field with a concentration on software technology with a 3\\.5 or better GPA
* Knowledge of development / test in an open source Linux environment including operation of SSH and shell functions
* Some knowledge of Python, Bash, or Groovy
* Some knowledge of CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab
* Some knowledge of Docker and containerization methods
* Some knowledge of SCM tools and best practices


**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC2
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s challenges. We’ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.

title: Custom Software Engineer
description:
**Project Role :** 
 Custom Software Engineer
   

  

**Project Role Description :** 
 Design, build and configure applications to meet business process and application requirements.
   

  

**Must have skills :** 
 Java Full Stack Development
   

  

**Good to have skills :** 
 Spring Boot
   

  

**Minimum 5 Year(s) Of Experience Is Required**
**Educational Qualification :** 
 15 years full time education
   

  

 Summary: As an Application Developer, you will design, build, and configure applications to meet business process and application requirements. Your typical day will involve collaborating with team members to develop innovative solutions and ensure seamless application functionality. Roles \\& Responsibilities: \\- Expected to perform independently and become an SME. \\- Required active participation/contribution in team discussions. \\- Contribute in providing solutions to work\\-related problems. \\- Develop and implement scalable and efficient Java\\-based applications. \\- Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to analyze user needs and design software solutions. \\- Conduct code reviews and ensure code quality and best practices are maintained. \\- Troubleshoot and debug applications to optimize performance and enhance user experience. \\- Stay updated on industry trends and technologies to continuously improve development processes. Professional \\& Technical Skills: \\- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in Java Full Stack Development. \\- Good To Have Skills: Experience with Spring Boot. \\- Strong understanding of RESTful web services and API development. \\- Hands\\-on experience with front\\-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. \\- Knowledge of database management systems such as MySQL or MongoDB. \\- Strong Knowledge in OOPS concept, garbage collector, JVM architecture,multi\\-threading, exception handling,collections,Java 8 functions \\-Framework: Spring boot \\-Need to be strong in core annotations,bean lifecycle,memory management Additional Information: \\- The candidate should have a minimum of 8 years of experience in Java full stack development \\- This position is based at our Chennai office only. \\- Presence at office premises at least of 2 days per week is mandatory and no WFH policy as per Accenture guidelines. \\- Work timings 11AM to 8PM \\- 15 years full\\-time education is required, with engineering degree.

title: Custom Software Engineer
description:

 Custom Software Engineer
   

  

**Project Role Description :**

**Good to have skills :** 
 Utilities Retail
   

  

**Minimum 5 Year(s) Of Experience Is Required**
**Educational Qualification :** 
 15 years full time education
   

  

 Summary: We are looking for a highly skilled Senior React Native Developer to join mobile engineering team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining high\\-quality mobile applications using React Native and Expo, with a strong focus on performance, accessibility, and security. You’ll collaborate closely with designers, backend engineers, and product managers to deliver seamless user experiences. Roles \\& Responsibilities:
   

  

* Develop and maintain mobile applications using React Native and Expo
* Write clean, maintainable code in TypeScript and modern JavaScript
* Optimise app performance and responsiveness across platforms
* Debug and troubleshoot native builds using Xcode (iOS) and Gradle (Android)
* Implement secure storage and authentication mechanisms (e.g. token storage, biometric encryption, root detection)
* Build responsive layouts using Flexbox and custom SVG graphics with D3
* Develop and test components in isolation using Storybook
* Integrate local and remote web content within mobile apps
* Patch JavaScript and native code to resolve compatibility issues during upgrades
* Ensure accessibility compliance using native tools (VoiceOver, TalkBack, Accessibility Inspector)
* Collaborate using Git, GitHub, and Azure DevOps
* Translate Figma designs into functional components using design tokens and shared libraries
* Integrate with authentication providers such as Azure B2C or similar OAuth IDPs
* Write and maintain unit tests to ensure code quality Professional \\& Technical Skills:
* Experience with C\\# .NET for backend API development
* Familiarity with Azure Application Insights for backend debugging
* Exposure to performance testing tools like JMeter
* Experience writing and maintaining Azure DevOps pipeline scripts Additional Information:
* Proven experience delivering production\\-grade React Native apps
* Strong understanding of mobile security and accessibility best practices
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast\\-paced environment
* Passion for clean code, testing, and continuous improvement

description:

 Summary: The Azure Databricks Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing scalable data pipelines and analytics solutions using Azure Databricks and related Azure data services. The role requires strong hands\\-on experience with PySpark, Delta Lake, Azure Data Lake, and ETL/ELT frameworks. The developer will work closely with data architects and stakeholders to build reliable, high\\-performing data engineering solutions following best practices and cloud standards. Roles and Responsibilities:
   

  

* Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines using Azure Databricks.
* Build and optimize ETL/ELT workflows incorporating data from multiple sources.
* Work with Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS), Azure SQL, Delta Lake, and other Azure data services.
* Implement data transformations using PySpark and Spark SQL within Databricks notebooks.
* Develop and manage Delta Live Tables and Lakehouse architecture solutions.
* Ensure data quality, performance tuning, and optimization of Spark jobs.
* Implement CI/CD pipelines for Databricks jobs using Azure DevOps.
* Monitor and troubleshoot Databricks clusters, jobs, and pipelines.
* Ensure adherence to data governance and security best practices within Azure. Professional and Technical Skills:
* Strong hands\\-on experience with Azure Databricks and Apache Spark (PySpark/Spark SQL).
* Good working knowledge of Azure Data Factory (ADF) for pipeline orchestration.
* Experience with Azure Data Lake, Azure Synapse, and Azure SQL Database.
* Solid understanding of Delta Lake concepts and implementation.
* Strong SQL development and data modeling skills.
* Experience in performance tuning of Spark jobs and optimizing large\\-scale datasets.
* Knowledge of CI/CD processes using Azure DevOps or similar tools.
* Strong problem\\-solving, debugging, and analytical skills. Additional Information:
* The candidate should have a minimum of 6 to 8 years of experience in Microsoft Azure Databricks
* We have location flex for this position

title: Member of Technical Staff - Cloud DevSecOps Engineer
description:
**Why Join Skyrelis?** 



* Build the world’s leading
 **AI security \\& observability** 
 platform.
* Work on cutting\\-edge multi\\-cloud infrastructure and global PoP architecture.
* Own complex security \\+ cloud problems end\\-to\\-end.
* Significant growth opportunity as one of the early engineers building the Skyrelis platform.



  





**About the Role** 




 Skyrelis is seeking a highly skilled Cloud DevSecOps Engineer (6–8 years) to join our platform engineering team. This role is critical in deploying and operating Skyrelis’ global Edge PoPs, secure data plane/control plane microservices, Envoy\\-based AI inspection gateways, and our complete observability pipeline across AWS and multi\\-cloud environments.
 



 You will own the secure deployment lifecycle—from infrastructure automation, certificate management, and observability—in addition to optimizing OpenSearch indexing, cluster performance, and building resilient CI/CD systems. This is a hands\\-on engineering role suitable for someone who thrives in high\\-scale security architectures and modern cloud\\-native systems.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




**Cloud \\& Kubernetes Infrastructure** 



* Deploy microservices using Helm, Terraform, and Kubernetes (EKS/GKE).
* Operate data plane \\& control plane workloads across AWS and multi\\-cloud.
* Support new regional deployments on demand.



**Envoy Deployment \\& Certificate Management** 



* Deploy Envoy proxies (sidecars, explicit/forward proxies, MITM).
* Manage PKI, certificate rotation, SDS/xDS integrations.
* Support customer\\-specific deployment patterns.



**Observability \\& OpenSearch** 



* Configure \\& troubleshoot OTEL receivers, OSIS ingestion pipelines.
* Manage OpenSearch indices, shards, mappings, log normalization, retention, snapshots.
* Ensure resiliency, scalability, and cost efficiency



**DevOps Automation \\& CI/CD** 



* Manage CI/CD pipelines for platform services.
* Implement canary/blue\\-green deployment strategies.
* Maintain secure secret storage and lifecycle (KMS/Secrets Manager).



**Security, Monitoring \\& Operations** 



* Review and strengthen cloud security policies.
* Integrate customer IDP (SAML/OIDC).
* Monitor using CloudWatch, configure alerting.
* Work with AWS Support when required.
* Participate in incident response and post\\-mortems.
* Support LLM model deployment workflows.



**Documentation \\& Environment Management** 



* Maintain architecture docs, runbooks, SOPs.
* Manage dev/stage/prod cloud environments and upgrades.



  





**Required Qualifications** 



* 6–8\\+ years hands\\-on DevOps/SRE/Cloud Engineering experience.
* Strong expertise with
 **AWS** 
 (VPCs, IAM, EC2/ECS/EKS, CloudWatch, ALB/NLB, Route 53, ACM, OpenSearch).
* Experience deploying and configuring
 **Envoy proxy** 
 (sidecars, forward proxies, MITM).
* Deep understanding of
 **TLS, PKI, certificate chains, SDS/xDS** 
 , and certificate lifecycle automation.
* Experience with
 **OTel Collector** 
 ,
 **OpenSearch** 
 ,
 **OSIS** 
 pipelines.
* Strong IaC experience using
 **Terraform** 
 ,
 **Helm** 
 ,
 **CloudFormation** 
 .
* Comfortable with
 **Kubernetes** 
 , microservices, autoscaling, networking.
* Solid experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Expertise in Linux, networking, DNS, routing, and containerized deployments (Docker).
* Programming/Scripting in Python, Bash, or Go.



**Preferred** 



* Experience with multi\\-region / multi\\-cloud rollouts (AWS, GCP, Azure).
* Familiarity with AI/LLM infra deployments (model hosting, GPU workflows, inference infrastructure).
* Exposure to SIEM, DLP, or security\\-oriented observability systems.
* Strong understanding of Zero Trust and identity federation (SAML/OIDC).



**Soft Skills** 



* Strong ownership and execution abilities.
* Excellent communication and documentation skills.
* Ability to operate independently in a fast\\-moving startup environment.
* Comfortable collaborating with engineering, security, and customer teams.



  






 We’re grateful to everyone who takes the time to apply. While we’re unable to respond to every applicant, we’ll be in touch directly with those whose experience aligns closely with the role.

title: Senior Software Engineer-Travel Integrations
job_function: Engineering, Information Technology, and Project Management
description:
**About Rippling**
 Rippling gives businesses one place to run HR, IT, and Finance. It brings together all of the workforce systems that are normally scattered across a company, like payroll, expenses, benefits, and computers. For the first time ever, you can manage and automate every part of the employee lifecycle in a single system.
   

  

 Take onboarding, for example. With Rippling, you can hire a new employee anywhere in the world and set up their payroll, corporate card, computer, benefits, and even third\\-party apps like Slack and Microsoft 365—all within 90 seconds.
   

  

 Based in San Francisco, CA, Rippling has raised $1\\.4B\\+ from the world’s top investors—including Kleiner Perkins, Founders Fund, Sequoia, Greenoaks, and Bedrock—and was named one of America's best startup employers by Forbes.
   

  

 We prioritize candidate safety. Please be aware that all official communication will only be sent from @Rippling.com addresses.
   

  

**About The Role**
 You’ll be part of the Travel integrations team, helping to define the future of corporate travel through the Rippling Platform’s integrated solutions. As part of Rippling’s Spend Suite—which also includes corporate cards, expense management, procurement, and bill pay—the Travel team is integral to our all\\-in\\-one solution for managing corporate spending.
   

  

 Our customers value the seamless integration of corporate cards, expense management, and accounting automation, with travel management as the next frontier. Our mission is to build the best travel management platform for employees, finance teams, and travel managers alike.
   

  

****You will:****
* Collaborate with Product Management and other stakeholders within Engineering (Frontend, UX, etc.) to maintain a high bar for quality in a fast\\-paced, iterative environment.
* Wear a product manager hat when needed.
* Build features that solve technical problems of high scope and complexity.
* Participate in planning activities, perform code reviews, and contribute to a growing team.
* Translate high\\-level business requirements into a software design; communicate the designs to the other developers in the team.
* Provide mentorship for Junior and Intermediate Engineers on your team to help them grow in their technical responsibilities and remove blockers to their autonomy.


****Qualifications:****
* Minimum 6\\+ years of programming experience
* Ability to exercise discretion and independent judgment in the performance of the duties
* Preferred experience in our technology stack\\- Go, Python, Django, MongoDB, AWS
* Strong CS knowledge
* Ability to thrive in an ambiguous environment by identifying areas of impact and independently pursuing them.
* Experience in travel domain is \\+ point.


**Additional Information**
 Rippling is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce and do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, ancestry, physical disability, mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, marital status, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, sexual orientation, veteran or military status, or any other legally protected characteristics. Rippling is dedicated to providing reasonable accommodations for candidates with disabilities who need assistance during the hiring process. To request a reasonable accommodation, please email accommodations@rippling.com.
   

  

 We highly value in\\-office collaboration to foster a cohesive work environment and company culture. For employees residing within a defined radius of a Rippling office, working on\\-site at least three days a week is considered an essential function of the role.
   

  

 This position offers a competitive salary, comprehensive benefits, and equity opportunities. The exact salary will be determined based on factors such as experience, skills, and location.
   

  

 Join us at Rippling and be a part of transforming how businesses manage performance\\-based compensation.

title: Lead Software Engineer (10+ Years in DotNet Core + 10 Years in Any RDBMS + 2 Years in Mongo DB + 3 Years in Angular/React/Vue + Azure)
description:
**Lead Software Engineer, Assurant, GCC\\-India**
 A Lead Software Engineer is a key player in the development and maintenance of software systems, guiding the technical direction of projects, and guiding team members.
   

  

**This position will be in Hyderabad/Bangalore/Chennai at our India location.**
**Work Time: 3:30 PM IST \\- 12:30 AM IST**
**What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?**
* Technical Leadership


 Architectural Design: Design software architecture, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security. Code Quality: Enforce coding standards and best practices to ensure high\\-quality code. Technical Solutions: Provide technical solutions and troubleshoot issues that arise during development. Innovation: Keep abreast of new technologies and incorporate them into the team's work where appropriate.
   

  

* Development


 Coding: Write, review, and optimize code for critical software components. Testing: Oversee the development and execution of unit tests, integration tests, and automated testing. Deployment: Manage deployment processes, ensuring smooth releases and minimal downtime.
   

  

* Continuous Improvement


 Performance Optimization: Analyze and optimize software performance. Process Improvement: Continuously improve development processes to enhance productivity and quality. Feedback Incorporation: Collect and incorporate feedback from users and stakeholders to improve software products.
   

  

* Communication


 Stakeholder Interaction: Communicate effectively with stakeholders, including product managers, designers, and other engineers. Documentation: Ensure comprehensive documentation of software design, code, and processes.
   

  

* Project Management


 Planning: Participate in project planning, including defining scope, timelines, and resources. Coordination: Coordinate tasks among team members, ensuring project milestones are met. Risk Management: Identify potential risks and implement mitigation strategies. Progress Tracking: Monitor and report on the progress of projects to stakeholders.
   

  

* Team Leadership


 Mentorship: Mentor junior and mid\\-level engineers, providing guidance and support for their professional development. Collaboration: Foster a collaborative environment, facilitating effective communication within the team and with other departments. Conflict Resolution: Address and resolve any conflicts or issues within the team.
   

  

**What are the requirements needed for this position?**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent
* Proficiency in designing, implementing, and maintaining back\\-end APIs using one of the following programming languages: C\\#, Python, or Go, with a minimum of 10\\+ years of experience.
* 10\\+ years of experience with relational database management systems (RDBMS) such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or Microsoft SQL Server, and at least 2 years of experience using NoSQL/document databases (preferably MongoDB).
* Minimum of 2\\+ years of experience with one of the front\\-end technology stacks: Angular , React, or Vue.
* At least 3 years of experience with Azure Cloud Platform and containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.
* Thorough understanding of object\\-oriented programming (OOP) concepts and design/architectural patterns for developing scalable and maintainable software.
* Strong problem\\-solving abilities and the capacity to collaborate effectively within a team environment.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including the capability to mentor and provide guidance to junior developers.
* Adaptability to new technologies and a commitment to staying abreast of industry trends.

title: Technology Platform Engineer
description:
**Project Role :** 
 Technology Platform Engineer
   

  

**Project Role Description :** 
 Creates production and non\\-production cloud environments using the proper software tools such as a platform for a project or product. Deploys the automation pipeline and automates environment creation and configuration.
   

  

**Must have skills :** 
 Salesforce Field Service Lightning
   

  

**Good to have skills :** 
 Salesforce Data
   

  

**Minimum 5 Year(s) Of Experience Is Required**

 Summary: As a Cloud Platform Engineer \\- Platform Administrator, you will work on large scale projects on Salesforce, collaborate with various teams to ensure seamless integration and functionality across platforms, contributing to the overall success of the projects you are involved in.. Roles \\& Responsibilities: \\- Expected to be an SME. \\- Collaborate and manage the team to perform. \\- Responsible for team decisions. \\- Engage with multiple teams and contribute on key decisions. \\- Provide solutions to problems for their immediate team and across multiple teams. \\- Facilitate knowledge sharing sessions to enhance team capabilities. \\- Monitor and evaluate the performance of cloud environments to ensure optimal operation. Professional \\& Technical Skills: \\- Must To Have Skills: Should have experience working on large scale projects. Proficiency in Salesforce Service Cloud / Field Services (FSL Cloud) \\- Good To Have Skills: Experience with Salesforce Data Cloud or Experience Cloud. \\- Strong understanding of cloud infrastructure and deployment strategies. \\- Experience with automation tools and scripting languages. \\- Familiarity with continuous integration and continuous deployment practices Additional Information: \\- The candidate should have minimum 5 years of experience in Salesforce Experience Cloud. \\- This position is based in Hyderabad. \\- A 15 years full time education is required.

title: Technofunctional / Senior Odoo Developer
description:
**Responsibilities**
**Odoo Development \\& Integrations**
* Develop and extend Odoo modules across all core apps, including backend logic, UI/XML views, frontend behavior, and reports
* Build and maintain frontend elements (UI views, XML templates, custom widgets, QWeb/PDF/Excel reports)
* Work across major Odoo business areas (Sales, Purchase, Inventory, Accounting, Manufacturing, HR, etc.)
* Translate functional requirements into clean technical specifications
* Support feasibility assessments, gap analysis, and alternative solution design
* Implement controllers, API endpoints, and server\\-side logic


**Architecture \\& Quality**
* Analyse requirements and design scalable, modular, maintainable Odoo solutions
* Ensure all solutions follow AMETRAS engineering standards, architectural principles, and OCA best practices
* Ensure performance, reliability, and long\\-term maintainability
* Ensure correct process logic, data consistency, and cross\\-module dependencies
* Identify functional and technical edge cases
* Support technical feasibility assessments and contribute to effort estimations
* Conduct code reviews to ensure quality, consistency, and maintainability
* Contribute to internal reusable components, shared frameworks, and coding standards


**Collaboration \\& Mentorship**
* Participate actively in Scrum/Kanban development processes
* Act as a bridge between functional/business teams and technical teams
* Collaborate daily with teams in India and Europe
* Mentor Junior and Mid\\-level developers


**OCA Contribution**
* Develop the capability to contribute regularly to the Odoo Community Association (OCA)
* Follow OCA guidelines and contribute improvements where appropriate


**AI\\-Driven Engineering**
* Use ChatGPT and PyCharm’s Junie for coding, debugging, testing, documentation, and analysis
* Help improve AI\\-driven engineering practices internally


 Desired Candidate Profile
   

  

**Odoo (Full Stack)**
* 8\\+ years professional Odoo development experience
* Strong Python engineering experience in production settings
* Solid understanding of Odoo’s backend and XML\\-based UI stack
* Bonus: JavaScript \\+ OWL framework experience


**Integrations**
* Experience integrating external systems using REST/SOAP
* Bonus: EDI experience


**AI Usage**
* Willingness to integrate ChatGPT and PyCharm’s Junie into daily development


**Bonus:** 
 Hands\\-on experience with
 **AI\\-assisted engineering**
**Soft Skills (Personal Requirements)**
**Communication \\& Collaboration**
* Excellent English communication skills (spoken and written)
* Ability to explain complex technical topics clearly
* Ability to translate functional requirements into technical concepts
* Strong collaboration skills in an international, multi\\-timezone setup


**Working Style \\& Mindset**
* Strong techno\\-functional mindset with understanding of end\\-to\\-end business processes
* Team\\-driven, self\\-organized, proactive working style
* High ownership, reliability, and accountability
* Structured, analytical, solution\\-oriented
* Comfortable working in agile environments
* Willing to mentor colleagues across India and Europe
* Openness to continuous learning, especially in AI and modern engineering practices


**Bonus: Additional Skills (Optional)**
* Experience with unit tests and Odoo’s testing framework
* Experience with automated UI testing (e.g., Playwright)
* Experience with Scrum/Kanban beyond participation
* DevOps exposure (Docker, Linux, CI/CD, Kubernetes, Terraform, IaC concepts)
* Active involvement in open\\-source communities, ideally OCA


 Back

title: Performance Engineer
description:
**Project Role :** 
 Performance Engineer
   

  

**Project Role Description :** 
 Diagnose issues that an in\\-house performance testing team has been unable to. There are five aspects to Performance Engineering: software development lifecycle and architecture, performance testing and validation, capacity planning, application performance management and problem detection and resolution.
   

  

**Must have skills :** 
 Reltio
   

  

**Good to have skills :** 
 NA
   

  

**Minimum 5 Year(s) Of Experience Is Required**
**Educational Qualification :** 
 15 years full time education
   

  

 Summary: The Reltio MDM Engineer will lead configuration, integration, and operations of the Reltio MDM platform. The role includes modelling, data quality rules configuration, API integrations, and ensuring reliable platform operations across business domains. Roles \\& Responsibilities: \\-Reltio MDM configuration (entities, matches, survivorship) \\-Reltio workflows and UI configuration \\-API integration skills (REST/GraphQL) \\-AWS operational experience (EKS, IAM, networking) Professional \\& Technical Skills: \\-Must Have Skills: Familiarity with Reltio Connectors (SAP, DB connectors) \\-Exposure to MDM integration patterns Additional Information: \\-Lead onboarding of data domains into Reltio. \\-Configure match rules, validation logic, and survivorship strategies. \\-Oversee platform upgrades, patches, and performance tuning. \\-Integrate Reltio with enterprise platforms such as Collibra, Atacama, and reporting tools. \\-Govern Reltio security, access, and compliance.
